article.title: Raytheon to Provide ATFLIR Replaceable Assemblies
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Raytheon Company, McKinney, Texas, is being awarded $9,866,912 for ceiling priced repair delivery order #7002 under a previously issued basic ordering agreement for the repair of nine weapon replaceable assemblies and eight shop replaceable assemblies of the Advanced Targeting Forward Looking Infrared System used in support of the F/A-18 aircraft.Â The Naval Supply Weapons Systems Support, Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, is the contracting activity.
